Text.Page:
We're out of supplies, and obviously the wagon train isn't coming soon. Not while we're surrounded, anyway.

But you know, supply lines pass nearby.

They're just not our supply lines.

, go requisition us some supplies from Thulsa's troops over there. By force!
These supplies definitely help. If they keep bringing 'em, and we keep taking 'em, we can hold out here forever!
I don't feel comfortable using equipment from the walking dead, but beggars can't be choosers, can they?
